text.text_translated:
'Life of Pi' is a book. It tells a very special story. This story is about a boy, Pi. He is from India. His ship sank in the Pacific Ocean. Pi was stuck in his small boat. A very wild tiger was also on the boat.
Yann Martel wrote the book. He is from Canada. It was his third book. It came out in 2001. After that, it sold more than seven million copies. People bought it all over the world. It won many prizes. It is in 41 languages.
Yann Martel's father worked for his country in other countries. So Yann lived in many countries as a child. He lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France, and Mexico.

best_attempt.text_translated:
'Life of Pi' is a book. It tells a very surprising story. It is not like other stories. It is about a young boy, Pi, from India. His ship broke in the Pacific Ocean. Pi was stuck in a small boat. A very wild and dangerous tiger was also in the boat.
Yann Martel wrote the book. He is from Canada. It was his third book. It came out in 2001. After that, it sold more than seven million copies. People bought it all over the world. It won many prizes. It is in 41 languages.
Yann Martel's father had a special job. He worked for his country in other countries. He helped his country there. So Yann lived in many countries as a child. He lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France, and Mexico.
